title: Afghanistan - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 9/8/21
itunes:title: Afghanistan - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 9/8/21
description:
George Noory and author Robert Young Pelton explore the take over of Afghanistan by the Taliban following the withdrawl of U.S. troops, if America is still respected around the world, and if the world is becoming more dangerous.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
